import { useEffect, useState } from 'react' import Loader from 'react-loaders' import AnimatedLetters from '../AnimatedLetters' import './index.scss' const Contact = () => { const [letterClass, setLetterClass] = useState('text-animate') const refForm = useRef useEffect(() => { setTimeout(() => { setLetterClass('text-animate-hover') }, 3000) }, []) return ( <>

-- Contact me using the form below -- --

) } export default Contact
